>
[Hooked](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1755)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 24</row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _hooked weapon_ extends hooks when it's used to attack. A _hooked weapon_ gains the [trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196) trait. If a _hooked weapon_ normally has the trip trait, you can attempt to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) a foe as a reaction when you critically hit it with the _hooked weapon_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
